reviewText: If you want to enjoy watching a well made comedy T.V. sit-com then I recommend that you buy the BBC production of REV. each episode has a true to life comedic feeling to it rather than the contrived assembly line comedy shows on American made cable television now a days, it is ironic that myself an American born person has to watch BBC T.V. shows for quality television. P.S. You will need a multi-region (read my review titled UNIVERSAL DVD PLAYER) DVD player in order to watch this British made T.V. show.
